ygData.subject: Re: Rarely mentioned fact...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Our only enchanter was level 36.  :)  This was sort of a guild exploratory mission.  We had a lot of deaths figuring out how to pull the giants.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 18 Jan 2000, Dennis Gustavsson wrote:
>
> We do it in a totally diffrent way, and I thought Harmonic
> and people he hunt giants with used this tactic to. (since
> we play on the same server). Our enchanters charm 1 giant
> each and let them along with everyone else kill the 3:rd
> giant. Then we let one go and kill him and keep the other
> one charmed. Then finally we take the last one.

Our only enchanter was level 36. :) This was sort of a guild
exploratory mission. We had a lot of deaths figuring out how
to pull the giants. Permafrost was about the only place we
could find that wasn't crowded what with the server hitting
2300 people that night.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
